   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(hibernate_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   26: 	 basic/1,dynamic_call/1,min_heap_size/1,bad_args/1,
   27: 	 messages_in_queue/1,undefined_mfa/1,no_heap/1,
   28:          wake_up_and_bif_trap/1]).
   29: 
   30: %% Used by test cases.
   31: -export([basic_hibernator/1,dynamic_call_hibernator/2,messages_in_queue_restart/2,
   32:          no_heap_loop/0,characters_to_list_trap/1]).
   33: 
   34: suite() ->
   35:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   36:      {timetrap, {minutes, 3}}].
   37: 
   38: all() -> 
   39:     [basic, dynamic_call, min_heap_size, bad_args, messages_in_queue,
   40:      undefined_mfa, no_heap, wake_up_and_bif_trap].
   41: 
   42: %%%
   43: %%% Testing the basic functionality of erlang:hibernate/3.
   44: %%%
   45: 
   46: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   47:     Ref = make_ref(),
   48:     Info = {self(),Ref},
   49:     MaxHeapSz = maximum_hibernate_heap_size([Info]),
   50:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> basic_hibernator(Info) end),
   51:     hibernate_wake_up(100, MaxHeapSz, Child),
   52:     Child ! please_quit_now,
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: maximum_hibernate_heap_size(Term) ->
   56:     %% When hibernating, a few extra words will be allocated to hold the
   57:     %% continuation pointer as well as scratch space for the interpreter/jit.
   58:     erts_debug:size(Term) + 8.
   59: 
   60: hibernate_wake_up(0, _, _) -> ok;
   61: hibernate_wake_up(N, MaxHeapSz, Child) ->
   62:     {heap_size,Before} = process_info(Child, heap_size),
   63:     case N rem 2 of
   64: 	0 ->
   65: 	    Child ! {acquire_old_heap,self()},
   66: 	    receive
   67: 		done -> ok
   68: 	    end;
   69: 	1 -> ok
   70:     end,
   71:     Child ! {hibernate,self()},
   72:     wait_until(fun () ->
   73: 			     {current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} ==
   74: 				 process_info(Child, current_function)
   75: 		     end),
   76:     {message_queue_len,0} = process_info(Child, message_queue_len),
   77:     {status,waiting} = process_info(Child, status),
   78:     {heap_size,After} = process_info(Child, heap_size),
   79:     io:format("Before hibernation: ~p  After hibernation: ~p\n",
   80: 	      [Before,After]),
   81:     true = After =< MaxHeapSz,
   82:     Child ! {whats_up,self()},
   83:     receive
   84:         {all_fine,X,Child,_Ref} ->
   85:             if
   86:                 N =:= 1 -> io:format("~p\n", [X]);
   87:                 true -> ok
   88:             end,
   89:             {backtrace,Bin} = process_info(Child, backtrace),
   90:             if
   91:                 size(Bin) > 1000 ->
   92:                     io:format("~s\n", [binary_to_list(Bin)]),
   93:                     ct:fail(stack_is_growing);
   94:                 true ->
   95:                     hibernate_wake_up(N-1, MaxHeapSz, Child)
   96:             end;
   97:         Other ->
   98:             io:format("~p\n", [Other]),
   99:             ct:fail(unexpected_message)
  100:     end.
  101: 
  102: basic_hibernator(Info) ->
  103:     {catchlevel,0} = process_info(self(), catchlevel),
  104:     receive
  105: 	Any ->
  106: 	    basic_hibernator_msg(Any, Info),
  107: 	    basic_hibernator(Info)
  108:     end.
  109: 
  110: basic_hibernator_msg({hibernate,_}, Info) ->
  111:     catch erlang:hibernate(?MODULE, basic_hibernator, [Info]),
  112:     exit(hibernate_returned);
  113: basic_hibernator_msg({acquire_old_heap,Parent}, _) ->
  114:     acquire_old_heap(),
  115:     Parent ! done;
  116: basic_hibernator_msg({whats_up,Parent}, {Parent,Ref}) ->
  117:     {heap_size,HeapSize} = process_info(self(), heap_size),
  118:     io:format("Heap size after waking up: ~p\n", [HeapSize]),
  119:     X = whats_up_calc(5000, 2, math:pi(), 4, 5, 6, 7, 8.5, 9, []),
  120:     Parent ! {all_fine,X,self(),Ref};
  121: basic_hibernator_msg(please_quit_now, _) ->
  122:     exit(normal);
  123: basic_hibernator_msg(Other, _) ->
  124:     exit({unexpected,Other}).
  125: 
  126: acquire_old_heap() ->
  127:     case process_info(self(), [heap_size,total_heap_size]) of
  128: 	[{heap_size,Sz},{total_heap_size,Total}] when Sz < Total ->
  129: 	    ok;
  130: 	_ ->
  131: 	    acquire_old_heap()
  132:     end.
  133: 
  134: %% The point with this calculation is to force memory to be
  135: %% allocated for the argument registers in the process structure.
  136: %% The allocation will be forced if the process is scheduled out
  137: %% while calling a function with more than 6 arguments.
  138: whats_up_calc(0, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, Acc) ->
  139:     {Acc,A2+A3+A4+A5+A6+A7+A8+A9};
  140: whats_up_calc(A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, Acc) ->
  141:     whats_up_calc(A1-1, A2+1, A3+2, A4+3, A5+4, A6+5, A7+6, A8+7, A9+8, [A1,A2|Acc]).
  142: 
  143: %%%
  144: %%% Testing a call to erlang:hibernate/3 that the compiler and loader do not
  145: %%% translate to an instruction.
  146: %%%
  147: 
  148: dynamic_call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  149:     Ref = make_ref(),
  150:     Info = {self(),Ref},
  151:     MaxHeapSz = maximum_hibernate_heap_size([Info]),
  152:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> ?MODULE:dynamic_call_hibernator(Info, hibernate) end),
  153:     hibernate_wake_up(100, MaxHeapSz, Child),
  154:     Child ! please_quit_now,
  155:     ok.
  156: 
  157: dynamic_call_hibernator(Info, Function) ->
  158:     {catchlevel,0} = process_info(self(), catchlevel),
  159:     receive
  160: 	Any ->
  161: 	    dynamic_call_hibernator_msg(Any, Function, Info),
  162: 	    dynamic_call_hibernator(Info, Function)
  163:     end.
  164: 
  165: dynamic_call_hibernator_msg({hibernate,_}, Function, Info) ->
  166:     catch apply(erlang, Function, [?MODULE, basic_hibernator, [Info]]),
  167:     exit(hibernate_returned);
  168: dynamic_call_hibernator_msg(Msg, _Function, Info) ->
  169:     basic_hibernator_msg(Msg, Info).
  170: 
  171: %%%
  172: %%% Testing setting the minimum heap size.
  173: %%%
  174: 
  175: min_heap_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     erlang:trace(new, true, [call]),
  177:     MFA = {?MODULE,min_hibernator,1},
  178:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, true, [local]),
  179:     Ref = make_ref(),
  180:     Info = {self(),Ref},
  181:     Child = spawn_opt(fun() -> min_hibernator(Info) end,
  182: 			    [{min_heap_size,15000},link]),
  183:     receive
  184:         {trace,Child,call,{?MODULE,min_hibernator,_}} ->
  185:             1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, false, [local]),
  186:             erlang:trace(new, false, [call])
  187:     end,
  188:     {heap_size,HeapSz} = process_info(Child, heap_size),
  189:     io:format("Heap size: ~p\n", [HeapSz]),
  190:     if
  191:         HeapSz =< 20 -> ok
  192:     end,
  193:     Child ! wake_up,
  194:     receive
  195: 	{heap_size,AfterSize} ->
  196: 	    io:format("Heap size after wakeup: ~p\n", [AfterSize]),
  197:             if
  198:                 AfterSize >= 15000 -> ok
  199:             end;
  200: 	Other ->
  201: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected: ~p\n", [Other])
  202:     end.
  203: 
  204: min_hibernator({Parent,_Ref}) ->
  205:     erlang:hibernate(erlang, apply, [fun min_hibernator_recv/1, [Parent]]).
  206: 
  207: min_hibernator_recv(Parent) ->
  208:     receive
  209: 	wake_up ->
  210: 	    Parent ! process_info(self(), heap_size)
  211:     end.
  212: 
  213: %%%
  214: %%% Testing feeding erlang:hibernate/3 with bad arguments.
  215: %%%
  216: 
  217: bad_args(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  218:     bad_args(?MODULE, {name,glurf}, [0]),
  219:     {'EXIT',{system_limit,_}} = 
  220: 	(catch erlang:hibernate(x, y, lists:duplicate(5122, xxx))),
  221:     bad_args(42, name, [0]),
  222:     bad_args(xx, 42, [1]),
  223:     bad_args(xx, 42, glurf),
  224:     bad_args(xx, 42, {}),
  225:     bad_args({}, name, [2]),
  226:     bad_args({1}, name,  [3]),
  227:     bad_args({1,2,3}, name, [4]),
  228:     bad_args({1,2,3}, name, [5]),
  229:     bad_args({1,2,3,4}, name, [6]),
  230:     bad_args({1,2,3,4,5,6}, name,[7]),
  231:     bad_args({1,2,3,4,5}, name, [8]),
  232:     bad_args({1,2}, name, [9]),
  233:     bad_args([1,2], name, [9]),
  234:     bad_args(55.0, name, [9]),
  235:     ok.
  236: 
  237: bad_args(Mod, Name, Args) ->
  238:     Res = (catch erlang:hibernate(Mod, Name, Args)),
  239:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  240:     case Res of
  241: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_Where}} ->
  242: 	    io:format("erlang:hibernate(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Mod,Name,Args,Res]);
  243: 	Other ->
  244: 	    io:format("erlang:hibernate(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Mod,Name,Args,Res]),
  245: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Other})
  246:     end.
  247: 
  248: 
  249: %%%
  250: %%% Testing calling erlang:hibernate/3 with messages already in the message queue.
  251: %%%
  252: 
  253: messages_in_queue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  254:     Self = self(),
  255:     Msg = {Self,make_ref(),a,message},
  256:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> messages_in_queue_1(Self, Msg) end),
  257:     Pid ! Msg,
  258:     Pid ! go_ahead,
  259:     receive
  260: 	done -> ok;
  261: 	Other ->
  262: 	    io:format("~p\n", [Other]),
  263: 	    ct:fail(unexpected_message)
  264:     end.
  265: 
  266: messages_in_queue_1(Parent, ExpectedMsg) ->
  267:     receive
  268: 	go_ahead -> ok
  269:     end,
  270:     {message_queue_len,1} = process_info(self(), message_queue_len),
  271:     erlang:hibernate(?MODULE, messages_in_queue_restart,
  272: 		     [Parent,ExpectedMsg]).
  273: 
  274: messages_in_queue_restart(Parent, ExpectedMessage) ->
  275:     receive
  276:         ExpectedMessage ->
  277:             Parent ! done;
  278:         Other ->
  279:             io:format("~p\n", [Other]),
  280:             ct:fail(unexpected_message)
  281:     end,
  282:     ok.
  283: 
  284: 
  285: %%%
  286: %%% Test that trying to hibernate to an undefined MFA gives the correct
  287: %%% exit behavior.
  288: %%%
  289: 
  290: undefined_mfa(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  291:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  292:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
  293: 				   %% Will be a call_only instruction.
  294: 				   erlang:hibernate(?MODULE, blarf, []) end),
  295:     Pid ! {a,message},
  296:     receive
  297:         {'EXIT',Pid,{undef,Undef}} ->
  298:             io:format("~p\n", [Undef]),
  299:             ok;
  300:         Other ->
  301:             io:format("~p\n", [Other]),
  302:             ct:fail(unexpected_message)
  303:     end,
  304:     undefined_mfa_1().
  305: 
  306: undefined_mfa_1() ->
  307:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
  308: 				   %% Force a call_last instruction by calling bar()
  309: 				   %% (if that is not obvious).
  310: 				   bar(),
  311: 				   erlang:hibernate(?MODULE, blarf, [])
  312: 			   end),
  313:     Pid ! {another,message},
  314:     receive
  315: 	      {'EXIT',Pid,{undef,Undef}} ->
  316: 		  io:format("~p\n", [Undef]),
  317: 		  ok;
  318: 	      Other ->
  319: 		  io:format("~p\n", [Other]),
  320: 		  ct:fail(unexpected_message)
  321: 	  end,
  322:     ok.
  323: 
  324: bar() ->
  325:     ok.
  326: 
  327: %%
  328: %% No heap
  329: %%
  330: 
  331: no_heap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  332:     H = spawn_link(fun () -> clean_dict(), no_heap_loop() end),
  333:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
  334:                           wait_until(fun () -> is_hibernated(H) end),
  335:                           [{heap_size, Size}, {total_heap_size, Size}]
  336:                               = process_info(H, [heap_size, total_heap_size]),
  337:                           true = Size =< maximum_hibernate_heap_size(0),
  338:                           receive after 10 -> ok end,
  339:                           H ! again
  340:                   end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
  341:     unlink(H),
  342:     exit(H, bye).
  343: 
  344: no_heap_loop() ->
  345:     flush(),
  346:     erlang:hibernate(?MODULE, no_heap_loop, []).
  347: 
  348: clean_dict() ->
  349:     {dictionary, Dict} = process_info(self(), dictionary),
  350:     lists:foreach(fun ({Key, _}) -> erase(Key) end, Dict).
  351: 
  352: %%
  353: %% Wake up and then immediately bif trap with a lengthy computation.
  354: %%
  355: 
  356: wake_up_and_bif_trap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  357:     Self = self(),
  358:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> erlang:hibernate(?MODULE, characters_to_list_trap, [Self]) end),
  359:     Pid ! wakeup,
  360:     receive
  361:         {ok, Pid0} when Pid0 =:= Pid -> ok
  362:     after 5000 ->
  363:         ct:fail(process_blocked)
  364:     end,
  365:     unlink(Pid),
  366:     exit(Pid, bye).
  367: 
  368: %% Lengthy computation that traps (in characters_to_list_trap_3).
  369: characters_to_list_trap(Parent) ->
  370:     Bin0 = <<"abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxz0123456789">>,
  371:     Bin = binary:copy(Bin0, 1500),
  372:     unicode:characters_to_list(Bin),
  373:     Parent ! {ok, self()}.
  374: 
  375: %%
  376: %% Misc
  377: %%
  378: 
  379: is_hibernated(P) ->
  380:     case process_info(P, [current_function, status]) of
  381: 	[{current_function, {erlang, hibernate, _}},
  382: 	 {status, waiting}] ->
  383: 	    true;
  384: 	_ ->
  385: 	    false
  386:     end.
  387: 
  388: flush() ->
  389:     receive
  390: 	_Msg -> flush()
  391:     after 0 ->
  392: 	    ok
  393:     end.
  394: 	   
  395: 
  396: wait_until(Fun) ->
  397:     case catch Fun() of
  398: 	true -> ok;
  399: 	_ -> receive after 10 -> wait_until(Fun) end
  400:     end.
